snippet: Badam Zari, a 40-year-old Pakistani, has made history by becoming the first woman to run for Parliament from the country’s conservative northwest tribal region.
lead_paragraph: Badam Zari, a 40-year-old Pakistani, has made history by becoming the first woman to run for Parliament from the country’s conservative northwest tribal region.

headline.seo: Pakistan: Historic Candidacy in Tribal Region
headline.main: Pakistan: Historic Candidacy in Tribal Region
headline.print_headline: Pakistan: Historic Candidacy in Tribal Region
